description: This file defines the navigation setup and several minimalist UI screens (Home, Device Detail, Camera) for an Android TV application using Jetpack Compose. It includes navigation routes, animated transitions, and basic UI components with focus handling for TV remote input.

methods.name: AppNavHost
methods.description: Sets up the navigation graph with routes for Home, Device Detail, and Camera screens, applying default animated transitions.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: Displays a simple screen with two buttons to navigate to Device Detail and Camera screens, designed for TV focus navigation.

methods.name: DeviceDetailScreen
methods.description: Shows the device ID passed via navigation argument and provides a back button.

methods.name: CameraScreen
methods.description: Displays the camera ID passed via navigation argument and includes a back button.
